title: Amazon API Gateway REST API to AWS Lambda to Amazon SNS with enhanced monitoring
description: Integration of Amazon API Gateway REST API with AWS Lambda to publish to Amazon SNS with enhanced monitoring

introBox.headline: How it works
text: This sample project demonstrates how to publish to a SNS Topic whenever the REST API is invoked using Lambda function.
This pattern deploys a Amazon API Gateway REST API with Lambda Function integration and SNS Topic with enhanced monitoring features including CloudWatch Alarms, X-Ray tracing, and Synthetics Canary.
